CustomField.description: This field is used to toggle visibility of Lightning Web Components in the Veteran Care Connect App. If this value is set to "Cerner" then only components relevant to Cerner will be displayed. The converse is true for VistA.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to toggle visibility of Lightning Web Components in the Veteran Care Connect App. If this value is set to "Cerner" then only components relevant to Cerner will be displayed. The converse is true for VistA.
CustomField.label: Veteran Care Connect EHR
